text: Mixi nde na i xa bɔxi ma, ala sɛniyɛnxie xaxili na naxan bɛ. I baba xa waxati, muxu bara a to fahaamula nan na kanyi ra, a xaxili fan, a xa lɔnni luxi nɛ alɔ alae gbe. Na nan a ra, i baba Mangɛ Nebukadansari nu bara a findi karamɔxɔɛe, sematoee, sɛrɛxɛdubɛe, nun mandurulae xunyi ra. I baba, naxan nu mangɛ ra, a tan
